entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries ending this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:39 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:39 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
